content.prompt: The first Inkan emperor, Pachacuti Inka Yupanqui, had Machu Picchu built to serve as a

choices.label: retreat that offered respite from the hot Cusco summers
site for conducting administrative affairs and ceremonies
highly guarded fortress that offered military protection
sacred training ground for the emperorâ€™s priestly advisors

topic.text: 5.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
